remarks: The set of neighbors of an element of the first component of an ordered pair, especially of a vertex in a graph.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Dec-2017.)
statement:
nbgraop1 $p |- ( ( ( V e. Y /\ E e. Z ) /\ N e. V ) -> ( Fun E -> ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) = { n e. V | E. i e. dom E ( E ` i ) = { N , n } } ) ) $.
$d E i n $.
$d N i n $.
$d V i n $.
$d Y n $.
$d Z n $.
